ðŸ“– Summary: Dagger is an open-source runtime designed for composable workflows, making it ideal for AI agents and CI/CD pipelines. It offers features like containerized execution, a universal type system, automatic caching, and built-in observability. Dagger aims to provide a platform-agnostic solution for building and running complex applications with repeatability and modularity.
